mapper.update:
update
set receicerName = #{receicerName}, phone = #{phone}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, district = #{district}, street = #{street}, detail = #{detail}, defaultStatus = #{defaultStatus}, modifyUserId = #{modifyUserId}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where receiveAddressId = #{receiveAddressId} and appUserId = #{appUserId} and effective = '01'

update
set defaultStatus = '00', modifyUserId = #{modifyUserId}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where appUserId = #{appUserId} and defaultStatus = '01' and effective = '01'

update
set appUserId = #{appUserId}, receicerName = #{receicerName}, phone = #{phone}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, district = #{district}, street = #{street}, detail = #{detail}, defaultStatus = #{defaultStatus}, orderNum = #{orderNum}, modifyUserId = #{modifyUserId}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where receiveAddressId = #{receiveAddressId}

update
set
appUserId = #{appUserId},
receicerName = #{receicerName},
phone = #{phone},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
district = #{district},
street = #{street},
detail = #{detail},
defaultStatus = #{defaultStatus},
orderNum = #{orderNum},
effective = #{effective},
modifyUserId = #{modifyUserId}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where receiveAddressId = #{receiveAddressId} and modifyTime = #{lastModifyTime}
mapper.select:
select
from
where 1=1
and ( receiveAddressCode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or receiveAddressName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
order by (orderNum+0)
